'''Composite Timber Long-Distance Hand Cart''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Composite Timber Long-Distance Hand Cart is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in [[Sumeru]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in the [[Desert of Hadramaveth]].
